text: I think after 24 years body is
complaining I must say it's it's not
easy to to wake up every morning and
feel that your body is fit and fine yeah
there are aches and pains and I think
you know there comes a stage where your
body tells you that enough you know
enough of stress on me and I need to
relax a bit
especially after a couple of games were
announced in in India against West
Indies after that I actually felt that
you know this is the right time to move
away from cricket and then I made a
request to BCCI to organise the last
match in Mumbai so that my mother could
come and watch me you're a man who is
very good at hitting a ball with a piece
of wood why is that made you into such a
huge celebrity well I don't know the
reason behind it maybe people liked the
way I used the Velo and you know I liked
so many I mean surreal Gavaskar was my
hero Vivian Richards was my hero and
they continued to be my heroes and
that's why I started playing cricket and
I wanted to become like them I I fell in
love with this sport from the age of six
or seven and for fun I used to play and
then there came a stage in my life at
the age of eleven where I decided that I
I want to play go to quality cricket and
when India won the World Cup in 1983
said that this is something that I would
like to do and from there on my cricket
started and after that I have not
thought about anything else
I mean basically it was all about
playing for the nation
and giving your best but for those but
for those watching you it is it is so
much more isn't it I was watching you
over the last few days and there's an
incredible kind of adulation this is
this is worship isn't it I mean how does
that make you feel when I when I took
this decision of retiring I never
thought the reaction would be like this
you know this is something that you
cannot plan
this this script was written by the
Almighty I don't think any one of us are
capable of writing the script like this
and I didn't plan all this it has just
happened and it's something which will
always stay with me for the rest of my
life the normal things that people get
to do without being mobbed in the
streets is that something that you would
like to be able to do no I I I know that
there are certain things which which I
can't do here in India which which you
know a normal person would do but then
there are always you know it's it's a
package deal you can do certain things
we have certain privileges and then on
the other side there are things which
you cannot do which a common man would
do and if I am given a choice I wouldn't
I wouldn't settle for anything else it's
been fantastic do you feel with such a
following with so many fans do you feel
a responsibility to give more back with
things like that
well while while cricket was going on
there was not much time whatever time I
would get I have always tried my level
best to support various causes and now
that I would have more time with me I I
would definitely want to be involved in
certain things which which I believe in
and then one of those would be this I
think not just not just me but if the
the entire nation can join this
initiative and it's it's about you know
giving them a fair chance I mean it's
the basic necessity you know just to
provide a solar light so that the the
children at night could study the the
mothers inside the home they can see
actually what they are cooking and and
these are the basic necessities of life
